titles: A proclamation set forth by the Kyng and Quenes most excellent maiesties with thaduice of theyr most honorable counsayle of certeyne moneyes and coynes of fyne gold & fine sylver with the valuation of the same, newlye set forth by theyr highnesse
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1553-1558 : Mary I)
Mary I, Queen of England, 1516-1558.
publisher: In ædibus Iohannis Cawodi Typographi Regiæ Maiestatis,
notes: "Geuen at our pallaice of Westminster xxvi. daye of December, the fyrst and seconde yeares of our raygnes."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
keywords: Monetary policy --  England --  Early works to 1800.
Coinage --  Law and legislation --  England --  Early works to 1800.
